notes: All requirements exceeded. Pool is fully stocked with 15 exchanges per tier (45 total). Health status is healthy. Buy-now endpoint accepts POST requests with amountUSD parameter and returns instant exchange URLs. Server is running in production mode with dynamic pool features including instant replenishment, 3 retries with exponential backoff, and automatic health checks.

additional_info.endpoint_test: buy-now endpoint confirmed working with POST method and amountUSD parameter
